mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thanks Ruellan and Company for the offers of service and the use of a bed; most likely will leave for America from Le Havre at the end of September; declines the use of the bed because he will have his family with him when he departs for America; feels it will be easier on everyone if he stays in a hotel; offers his thanks again.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1789 July 30, Paris, [France], to Ruellan and Company, [Le Havre, France].
